de.ovgu.featureide.fm.ui.editors

Class FeatureUIHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ovgu.featureide.fm.ui.editors.FeatureUIHelper

  • public class FeatureUIHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    this is a hack to quickly associate features with dimension and size (which is not available in the model). luckily these informations do not need to be stored persistently.
    Author:
    Christian Kaestner
